item.description:
"How to Know God" a workshop with Father Peter Bowes

Saturday, September 13. 10am-2pm. $35 (includes lunch)

People across the centuries have sought to know God in a personal and intimate way; a way that brings about a true relationship of love, protection, understanding and guidance. We know the fruits of this relationship from the writings of the great mystics of all times: bliss, peace, love, creativity and rejuvenation. Join Father Peter Bowes, a modern day mystic, as he echoes the truths that have survived centuries of time and shares how to know God by disciplining the mind, emotions and desire nature.
